Quick Start Theme Typography Controls Components

Quick Start

main.css is a minimalistic css framework

In this documentation used Alpine.js for better experience. But CSS framework is not dependent on it. You can use it with any other framework or with vanilla JS.

Installation

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://cdn.cesbo.com/main.css" />

Spinner

Animated spinner to indicates loading process. Available variables:

  • --color - spinner color. By the default primary color used
  • --size - dots radius. By the default 1rem
